Subcommittee on Communications, Technology, and the Internet

official_title: Expressing the support of the House of Representatives for the goals and ideals of National Internet Safety Month.

summary.text: Supports the goals and ideals of National Internet Safety Month. Recognizes that parents, teachers, and community leaders can empower children to resist online sexual predators. Encourages parents to take online safety concerns seriously and to safeguard family members from such threats. Asks state governors to actively promote National Internet Safety Month. Encourages the launch of a national media campaign on Internet safety awareness.

titles.title: Expressing the support of the House of Representatives for the goals and ideals of National Internet Safety Month.
